message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your operations and bring significant value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I see the value in the product but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $9,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a proposal of $10,500 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $10,500 is still a bit high for my budget. How about we meet in the middle at $9,750?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I am pleased to counter with a price of $10,250 for the product.
Alice, we're getting closer. I'm willing to come up a bit to $9,900 to make this work.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I am pleased to counter with a price of $10,100 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we settle this right now at $10,000?
